resources.string: This Upgrade will upgrade the Frequency with which you shoot. Meaning that you will shoot faster the more of these you collect
This Upgrade will provide your Ship with a shield against most enemy attacks. Be careful though, as it only lasts for a limited time.
This Upgrade will provide you a rocket to fire against enemies. The rocket will deliver 10 damage points making it very useful against more powerful enemies.
This Upgrade will provide you with a powerful bomb, that will destroy almost anything on release
This Upgrade will provide you with an extra life.
These are normal fighters. They are not much of a threat, but can provide dangerous in larger amounds
These are mid-sized enemies, that are much faster and agile than normal fighters. Always have a shield equipped.
These are the motherships, proceed with extreme caution. Capable of shooting and utilising extensive armor plating.
